pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aggregate Longitudinal Survey Data // Aggregate Business Tendency Survey Data (and other qualitative surveys) to time series at various aggregation levels. Run aggregation of survey data in a speedy, re-traceable and a easily deployable way. Aggregation is substantially accelerated by use of data.table. Panelaggregation aims at providing an interface that is more geared towards survey researchers.
